a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Relative share of Google searches for causes of death,
The relative share of Google searches using keywords and synonyms of the top 10 causes of death in the United
States in addition to terrorism, homicide and drug overdoses.
Data source: Shen et al. (2018). Based on Google Trends.
